item.title: Infor PL Group Reports Mixed Financial Results
item.description: Infor PL Group, publisher of "Dziennik Gazeta Prawna," reports a 10% revenue increase but a profit drop of over one third for 2023.

item.title: Żabka Franchisees Allege Pressure, Debt
item.description: Franchisees of Żabka accuse the network of unfair practices, including forced openings on non-working days and financial difficulties upon resignation. Żabka denies these claims.
